00026 #include "httpresponse.h"
00027 
00028 static const QByteArray reasonPhrases[] =
00029 {
00030     // 1xx Informational
00031     "Continue",
00032     "Switching Protocols",
00033     "Processing",
00034     // 2xx Successful
00035     "OK",
00036     "Created",
00037     "Accepted",
00038     "Non-Authoritative Information",
00039     "No Content",
00040     "Reset Content",
00041     "Partial Content",
00042     "Multi-Status",
00043     // 3xx Redirection
00044     "Multiple Choices",
00045     "Moved Permanently",
00046     "Found",
00047     "See Other",
00048     "Not Modified",
00049     "Use Proxy",
00050     "Switch Proxy",
00051     "Temporary Redirect",
00052     // 4xx Client Error
00053     "Bad Request",
00054     "Unauthorized",
00055     "Payment Required",
00056     "Forbidden",
00057     "Not Found",
00058     "Method Not Allowed",
00059     "Not Acceptable",
00060     "Proxy Authentication Required",
00061     "Request Timeout",
00062     "Conflict",
00063     "Gone",
00064     "Length Required",
00065     "Precondition Failed",
00066     "Request Entity Too Large",
00067     "Request-URI Too Long",
00068     "Unsupported Media Type",
00069     "Requested Range Not Satisfiable",
00070     "Expectation Failed",
00071     "I'm a teapot", // IETF joke
00072     "Unprocessable Entity",
00073     "Locked",
00074     "Failed Dependency",
00075     "Unordered Collection",
00076     "Upgrade Required",
00077     // 5xx Internal Server Error
00078     "Internal Server Error",
00079     "Not Implemented",
00080     "Bad Gateway",
00081     "Service Unavailable",
00082     "Gateway Timeout",
00083     "HTTP Version Not Supported",
00084     "Variant Also Negotiates",
00085     "Insufficient Storage",
00086     "Not Extended"
00087 };
00088 
00089 inline int statusCodeToReasonPhrasesIndex(int st)
00090 {
00091     int index = 0;
00092     // invalid
00093     if (st < 100) {
00094         return -1;
00095     }
00096     // 1xx code
00097     if (st < 200) {
00098         if (st < 103)
00099             return index + (st - 100);
00100         else
00101             return -1;
00102     } else {
00103         index += 3;
00104     }
00105     // 2xx code
00106     if (st < 300) {
00107         if (st < 208)
00108             return index + (st - 200);
00109         else
00110             return -1;
00111     } else {
00112         index += 8;
00113     }
00114     // 3xx code
00115     if (st < 400) {
00116         if (st < 308)
00117             return index + (st - 300);
00118         else
00119             return -1;
00120     } else {
00121         index += 8;
00122     }
00123     // 4xx code
00124     if (st < 500) {
00125         if (st < 419)
00126             return index + (st - 400);
00127         else if (st > 421 && st < 427)
00128             return index + (st - 403);
00129         else
00130             return -1;
00131     } else {
00132         index += 24;
00133     }
00134     // 5xx code
00135     if (st < 508)
00136         return index + (st - 500);
00137     else if (st == 510)
00138         return index + 8;
00139     else
00140         return -1;
00141 }
00142 
00143 HttpResponse::HttpResponse(const HttpVersion &httpVersion, int statusCode,
00144                            bool closeConnection) :
00145     HttpMessage(httpVersion),
00146     m_statusCode(statusCode),
00147     m_closeConnection(closeConnection)
00148 {
00149     int i = statusCodeToReasonPhrasesIndex(statusCode);
00150     if (i != -1)
00151         m_reasonPhrase = reasonPhrases[i];
00152 }
00153 
00154 HttpResponse::HttpResponse(const HttpVersion &httpVersion, int statusCode,
00155                            const QByteArray &reasonPhrase, bool closeConnection) :
00156     HttpMessage(httpVersion),
00157     m_statusCode(statusCode),
00158     m_reasonPhrase(reasonPhrase),
00159     m_closeConnection(closeConnection)
00160 {
00161 }
00162 
00163 bool HttpResponse::setStatusCode(int st)
00164 {
00165     int i = statusCodeToReasonPhrasesIndex(st);
00166     if (i != -1) {
00167         m_statusCode = st;
00168         m_reasonPhrase = reasonPhrases[i];
00169         return true;
00170     } else {
00171         return false;
00172     }
00173 }
00174 
00175 void HttpResponse::setStatusCode(int st, const QByteArray &reasonPhrase)
00176 {
00177     m_statusCode = st;
00178     m_reasonPhrase = reasonPhrase;
00179 }
00180 
00181 void HttpResponse::setReasonPhrase(const QByteArray &reasonPhrase)
00182 {
00183     m_reasonPhrase = reasonPhrase;
00184 }
00185 
00186 void HttpResponse::setCloseConnection(bool close)
00187 {
00188     m_closeConnection = close;
00189 }
